topic.title: Publishing Tracked Changes, Comments, and Color Highlights

body.p:
By default, tracked changes do not influence the published output. However, certain parameters can be enabled to display tracked changes and comments in WebHelp Responsive and PDF output:
WebHelp Responsive - Enable the webhelp.show.changes.and.comments publishing parameter. For more details, see: .
PDF (CSS based) - Enable the show.changes.and.comments publishing parameter. For more details, see: .
PDF (XSL-FO based) - Enable the show.changes.and.comments publishing parameter.
